forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the night embraces the city with a gentle veil of clouds, the air brisk and invigorating as it hovers just above fifty degrees. A steady west wind reminds us of the bay’s presence, carrying whispers of the sea through the streets, punctuated by occasional gusts that stir the quiet. As dawn approaches, the promise of a sun-drenched day begins to unfold, with temperatures forecasted to linger in the mid-sixties, a comfortable warmth settling in by afternoon… though the cool kiss of the wind will persist, encouraging layers.

You can anticipate an unhindered brilliance as the sun climbs high, painting the sky in vivid cerulean hues. However, the marine layer rests just offshore, perhaps visible as a ghostly presence clinging to the edges of view — a reminder of the coastal dynamics at play. This day invites exploration with its cheerful disposition; a leisurely stroll through the gardens at Golden Gate Park or a café visit is particularly enticing. One might choose a light jacket to ward off the lingering chill, perfect for those moments in shaded enclaves. With such weather gracing the city, any number of understated distractions awaits, from leisurely reads to an afternoon in a local bistro, savoring the gentle hum of city life.
